name: Contagion (itch) (terang)
description:
This is my first Game Jam and it was developed at the first BC Game Jam! The theme was "Dimensions" so we made an endless 3D/2D and infinite dimensional runner game! I'm super happy with how this game turned out especially for a bunch of first timers!

Warning: Game has flashing colors and lights!

The team comprised of:

Procedural Generation - Josh Abe
Obstacles - Elom & Theresa
Music - Devon Bird
Credits and Intro Scene - Diana Watson
Player and lighting - Lev McKinney
Camera and Collectables - Theresa Kikuchi
Art and sound - Kai Wessner
